snippet: Hassan Sheik Mohamud, who was elected last week by lawmakers, was sworn in amid tight security, giving Somalia its first elected government in decades.
abstract: Hassan Sheik Mohamud is inaugurated as Somalia's president four days after surviving an assassination attempt; Mohamud acknowledges the security challenges he faces and promises to be an advocate for democracy.
lead_paragraph: Hassan Sheik Mohamud, who was elected last week by lawmakers, was sworn in amid tight security, giving Somalia its first elected government in decades.

headline.seo: Hassan Sheik Mohamud Inaugurated as Somalia’s President
headline.main: Somalia President Is Inaugurated Four Days After Assassination Attempt
headline.print_headline: Somalia President Is Inaugurated Four Days After Assassination Attempt
